description: Interprets voice commands and executes text tasks including document generation (PRDs, emails, outlines), text rephrasing/transformation, writing assistance, and research summaries.

example_response.intent: The detected intent category: generate, rephrase, research, or assist
example_response.title: A short title summarizing the command
example_response.content: The full text response to the user's command, formatted in markdown
example_response.command_type: Badge label: Generate, Rephrase, Research, or Transform
